arg.name: ouster_ns
arg.description: Override the default namespace of all ouster nodes

arg.name: timestamp_mode
metadata
arg.description: path to write metadata file when receiving sensor data

arg.name: bag_file
arg.description: file name to use for the recorded bag file

arg.name: sensor_frame
arg.description: sets name of choice for the sensor_frame tf frame, value can not be empty

arg.name: lidar_frame
arg.description: sets name of choice for the os_lidar tf frame, value can not be empty

arg.name: imu_frame
arg.description: sets name of choice for the os_imu tf frame, value can not be empty

arg.name: point_cloud_frame
arg.description: which frame to be used when publishing PointCloud2 or LaserScan messages. Choose between the value of sensor_frame or lidar_frame, leaving this value empty would set lidar_frame to be the frame used when publishing these messages.

arg.name: use_system_default_qos
arg.description: Use the default system QoS settings

arg.name: proc_mask
arg.description: The IMG flag here is not supported and does not affect anything, to disable image topics you would need to omit the os_image node from the launch file

arg.name: scan_ring
arg.description: use this parameter in conjunction with the SCAN flag and choose a value the range [0, sensor_beams_count)
